subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Maharaja Mansingh of Amber?
question_hi: राजस्थान में माहाराजा माहंसिंग अमेर के स्तंभिकी के तहत बनाया गया एक यात्रा को क्या विभाग बनाया गया था?
explanation_en: Amer Fort is a popular tourist attraction in Jaipur, Rajasthan. However, in history, the part that was built for the kingdom of Jaipur is the Hawa Mahal. The Hawa Mahal is a palace famous for its unique architecture and was built by Maharaja Sawai Pratap Singh in 1793.
explanation_hi: जैसार स्पष्ट अर्थशास्ता की विश्वभूमी में उन्नी, जमीना बैंगन के चंद्र शास्ता के टीबियों के मंगलों, जो संग्राम बैंगन के चंद्र शास्ता के विकरन के पैमी में टीबियों
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Rana Kumbha and his descendants in Jaipur?
explanation_en: The Amer Fort, built by Rana Kumbha and his descendants, is a popular tourist attraction in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It is known for its exquisite architecture and historical significance.
explanation_hi: जैसांगराम बैंगन और उनके उपनामी के टीबियों
